column9: Several breaks in my right leg, ankle, foot due to accident. I have RSD nerve damage along with the deep throbbing pain and bone on bone pain. Also have trigeminal neuralgia and severe pain and headaches due to systemic lupus. I was taking several different pain etc meds and was able to drop them all and just take the Morphine Im injectable. Amazing how 1 thing can take the place of 8 and do a much better job.

column9: The 18 months before receiving morphine, would be comparible to being an abusded test animal in a shelter.  The testing would consist having a cervical spinal injury with no pain killers.  Ha. Ha. lets see how much he can take.  Oh and guess what I'am not seeking meds!!  I have a real injury they still havn't figured out completely.  I can only thank god the pain is for the most part manigable.  Two thumbs up for morphine and the doctor that perscribed it.  PS.
